heroSubtitle: Secure management platform for Masonic lodges
readySubtitle: Join the lodges that trust MasonConnect for their daily management

secureComms.title: Secure Communications
secureComms.description: Exchange with your brothers in complete confidentiality thanks to our encrypted messaging system.

tenueManagement.title: Meeting Management
tenueManagement.description: Plan your meetings, manage attendance and share agendas easily.

documents.title: Digital Archives
documents.description: Store and share your official documents and papers in a secure space.

memberDirectory.title: Member Directory
memberDirectory.description: Easily find contact information and details for all members of your lodge.

masonicLibrary.title: Masonic Library
masonicLibrary.description: Access a collection of resources and papers organized by degree.

visitorAccess.title: Visitor Access
visitorAccess.description: Allow visiting brothers temporary access to certain resources of your lodge.
